title: Spread X
body:
## **Spread X**

**The Task**

We were asked to create a completely new look and feel for SpreadEx that gave the brand personality and increased brand recognition.

**The Solution**

We developed the ‘Red Man’ and applied the character across all marketing materials including a variety of animations for their website.

**The Results**

The Red Man has raised brand awareness he has raised brand awareness, gained many fans and increased SpreadEx’s customer base and bet turnover.
